title: How to Make Perfect Chicken Curry at Home – A Step-by-Step Guide
content:
Introduction
Chicken curry is one of the most loved dishes in Indian households, known for its rich flavors, aromatic spices, and comforting taste. Whether you’re a beginner or a seasoned cook, this recipe will help you prepare a restaurant-style chicken curry right in your kitchen.

Ingredients You’ll Need:

- 500g chicken (with bone or boneless)

- 2 medium onions (finely chopped)

- 2 medium tomatoes (pureed)

- 2 tbsp cooking oil or ghee

- 1 tbsp ginger-garlic paste

- 2-3 green chilies (optional, for spice)

- 1 tsp turmeric powder

- 1 tsp red chili powder

- 2 tsp coriander powder

- 1 tsp garam masala powder

- Salt to taste

- Fresh coriander leaves (for garnish)

- 1 cup water

Step-by-Step Preparation:

Step 1: Marinate the Chicken
In a bowl, mix the chicken with a pinch of salt, turmeric, and chili powder. Let it rest for 20 minutes for better flavor.

Step 2: Prepare the Base
Heat oil or ghee in a pan. Add chopped onions and sauté until golden brown. Add ginger-garlic paste and green chilies, cook for 2 minutes.

Step 3: Add Spices & Tomato Puree
Add turmeric, chili powder, coriander powder, and salt. Stir well. Add tomato puree and cook until the oil separates from the masala.

Step 4: Cook the Chicken
Add marinated chicken pieces and coat them well with the masala. Cook for 5-7 minutes on medium heat.

Step 5: Add Water & Simmer
Pour in 1 cup of water, cover the pan, and cook for 15-20 minutes until the chicken is tender.

Step 6: Garnish & Serve
Sprinkle garam masala and fresh coriander leaves. Serve hot with steamed rice, naan, or chapati.

Pro Cooking Tip: For a creamier texture, add a few tablespoons of coconut milk or fresh cream in the last 5 minutes of cooking.

Conclusion
Making a delicious chicken curry at home is easier than you think. With fresh ingredients, the right spices, and a little patience, you can create a meal that’s sure to impress your family and friends.
